name: The Consuming Dark
description:
Dive into the abyss in the search for hope. Dive into the abyss and follow the light. Dive into the abyss and let it dive into you.

The Consuming Dark is a short linear horror game made for the Open Jam 2022 one the very last day.

Source code can be found at the following repo:
https://codeberg.org/CapitalEx/the-consuming-dark
